text.p: Monsanto Co said Wednesday it has completed its acquisition of biotechnology company Calgene Inc.
The company said the acquisition was completed on Monday, when the merger of a Monsanto subsidiary and Calgene became effective.
As a result of the merger, Calgene terminated the registration of its shares with the Securities and Exchange Commission and delisted the shares from the Nasdaq market, the company said.

Monsanto said Calgene shareholders who did not tender their shares to Monsanto in its tender offer are entitled to receive the $8 per share in cash, the same price paid for Calgene shares in the offer.
